description: This file defines a mock class for the IHdmiCecSink interface, along with its notification subclass, used for unit testing HDMI CEC Sink functionalities. It includes mock methods for various HDMI CEC operations and event notifications.

classes.name: HdmiCecSinkMock
classes.description: Mock implementation of the IHdmiCecSink interface for unit testing HDMI CEC Sink functionalities.

classes.name: HdmiCecSinkNotificationMock
classes.description: Mock implementation of IHdmiCecSink::INotification for testing HDMI CEC event notifications.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Mocks the registration of a notification handler.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Mocks the unregistration of a notification handler.

methods.name: Configure
methods.description: Mocks configuration of the HDMI CEC sink with a service.

methods.name: GetActiveRoute
methods.description: Mocks retrieval of the active route information.

methods.name: GetActiveSource
methods.description: Mocks retrieval of the active source details.

methods.name: GetAudioDeviceConnectedStatus
methods.description: Mocks status check for audio device connection.

methods.name: GetDeviceList
methods.description: Mocks retrieval of the device list.

methods.name: GetEnabled
methods.description: Mocks check if the HDMI CEC sink is enabled.

methods.name: GetOSDName
methods.description: Mocks retrieval of On-Screen Display name.

methods.name: GetVendorId
methods.description: Mocks retrieval of vendor ID.

methods.name: PrintDeviceList
methods.description: Mocks printing of device list.

methods.name: RequestActiveSource
methods.description: Mocks requesting the active source.

methods.name: RequestShortAudioDescriptor
methods.description: Mocks request for short audio descriptor.

methods.name: SendAudioDevicePowerOnMessage
methods.description: Mocks sending power-on message to audio device.

methods.name: SendGetAudioStatusMessage
methods.description: Mocks sending request for audio status.

methods.name: SendKeyPressEvent
methods.description: Mocks sending a key press event.

methods.name: SendUserControlPressed
methods.description: Mocks sending user control pressed event.

methods.name: SendUserControlReleased
methods.description: Mocks sending user control released event.

methods.name: SendStandbyMessage
methods.description: Mocks sending standby message.

methods.name: SetActivePath
methods.description: Mocks setting the active routing path.

methods.name: SetActiveSource
methods.description: Mocks setting the active source.

methods.name: SetEnabled
methods.description: Mocks enabling or disabling the HDMI CEC sink.

methods.name: SetMenuLanguage
methods.description: Mocks setting the menu language.

methods.name: SetOSDName
methods.description: Mocks setting the on-screen display name.

methods.name: SetRoutingChange
methods.description: Mocks changing the routing.

methods.name: SetupARCRouting
methods.description: Mocks setup of ARC routing.

methods.name: SetVendorId
methods.description: Mocks setting the vendor ID.

methods.name: SetLatencyInfo
methods.description: Mocks setting latency information.
